document.full_text: tiger woods was gracious, smiling, on a few occasions monosyllabic and prickly, but above all positive as he discussed his bid for a fifth masters title at augusta national this week.
document.title: tiger woods talks up his own chances at augusta national
lines_and_colors: tiger woods was gracious, smiling, on a few occasions monosyllabic and prickly, but above all positive as he discussed his bid for a fifth masters title at augusta national this week.
